s22.message: Fixed cases where tabs break assumptions made by webpages, particularly Acid3 test (bug 22435)

s9.message: "Add filter subscription" dialog (also displayed as post-install page)

s8.message: Simplified status bar panel by removing the hidden "Adblock" text (user style updated for those who still want to see it)

s17.message: Fixed: "Add filter subscription" page on first install might be closed by session restore

s1.message: The following lists the major changes compared to Adblock Plus 1.1.3.

s7.message: Fixed: Some Adblock Plus messages were appearing with the generic "JavaScript Application" title (forum topic)

s6.message: Added more information to the ABP icon tooltip (forum topic)

s5.message: Blocking HTML5 audio/video is now possible via context menu

s4.message: Removed unmaintained translations: Estonian, Persian, Norwegian (Bokm√•l), Lithuanian

s13.message: Adding "custom" subscriptions is possible in the same dialog now

s23.message: Tabs now fade out when mouse is moved away instead of disappearing immediately

s52.message: Fixed: loading filter rules with separator placeholder (^) is very slow

s51.message: Subscription download errors are reported to Error Console

s12.message: In the post-install case: added warning when leaving without adding a filter subscription

s26.message: Fixed: Context menu keyboard key wasn't working on the list

s11.message: Best available subscription recommendation is preselected

s27.message: Fixed: Search string wasn't remembered when detaching/reattaching (forum topic)

s19.message: Improved positioning of tabs, position now adjusts to dynamic changes in the webpage and scrolling

s39.message: Changed presentation of the contributors list to make it more compact, significantly less scrolling necessary now

s35.message: Fixed: Hotkeys like Ctrl+X sometimes wouldn't work until the context menu is opened

s34.message: Fixed: Context menu keyboard key wasn't working on the list

s37.message: Added "block entire domain" as filter suggestion in addition to "block this server" (forum topic)

s10.message: Completely redesigned to make this dialog easier to use (forum topic)

s16.message: For supplemental subscriptions: Adding main subscription is suggested if the user isn't subscribed to it yet. Specifying main subscription is also possible with abp: links in webpages (forum topic)

s15.message: Filter subscriptions matching user's locale are highlighted

s14.message: The complete list of subscriptions loads into the same dialog, visiting the webpage is no longer necessary

s20.message: Fixed most conditions where tabs would become invisible due to page layout (bug 12910)

s33.message: Fixed: Preferences window broken on operating systems with "exotic" regional settings like Georgian (work-around for Mozilla bug 508783)

s32.message: Filter groups like "My Ad Blocking Rules" are automatically re-enabled when the last filter is removed from them (forum topic)

s30.message: Ensured correct functioning even with browser.frames.enabled preference switched off

s25.message: When new tabs are opened browser preferences are respected (particularly whether the tab should be opened in background)

s21.message: Fixed cases where tabs would cause side-effects when showing up (e.g. bug 22246)

s44.message: Thunderbird: Positioned toolbar icon with the message actions, that's the more logical place for it

s45.message: Thunderbird: Made tabs opened from Adblock Plus dialogs open in Thunderbird rather than external browser

s46.message: SeaMonkey Mail: Opening tabs while no browser window is open now opens a new browser window (same way links in mail are treated)

s47.message: Songbird: Fixed toolbar icon in the new Purplerain theme (remaining issue is Songbird bug 20787)

s40.message: Most parts of the contributors list are populated dynamically now (filter subscription authors from the list of recommended subscriptions, translators from the info in extension's install manifest)

s42.message: Firefox Mobile/Fennec: Adblock Plus status is displayed in identity panel or as a site action (Fennec 1.0 and Fennec 1.1 respectively) and allows enabling/disabling Adblock Plus on a site

s43.message: Firefox Mobile/Fennec: Made post-install page show up reliably (Mozilla bug 531071)

s50.message: Added new $elemhide filter option for exception rules, allows disabling all element hiding rules on a page (forum topic)

s28.message: "Disable filter on ..." was mistakenly hidden for some filters (bug 22481)

s29.message: No longer listing disabled filters if Adblock Plus is disabled (forum topic)

s49.message: Implemented a number of performance improvement measures, especially to reduce application startup delay
